about_the_game:
Dead Humanity is a game that offers an immersive survival horror experience, taking you to a brutal post-apocalyptic world. This game is told through the eyes of a character who is in a coma after a massive traffic accident. But fate could not have predicted what was about to happen to our character. While our character is in a coma, he captures a moment when a huge epidemic that ravages the world breaks out.



Main Features of the Game:

A Suspenseful Story:
Players will uncover mysteries and secrets as they become fascinated with the fearful world their characters inhabit.

Rich Graphics and Atmosphere:
It offers detailed graphics and atmospheric sound effects to deliver an unforgettable visual experience.

Humanity and Change Theme:
The game will question the limits of human nature and reflect your character's inner battle.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is not recommended for people of all ages. Excessive blood, spooky creatures, etc. includes!
